coref: A certain man who visited foreign lands could talk of little when A certain man who visited foreign lands returned to A certain man who visited foreign lands home except the wonderful adventures A certain man who visited foreign lands had met with and the great deeds A certain man who visited foreign lands had done abroad. One of the feats A certain man who visited foreign lands told about was a leap A certain man who visited foreign lands had made in a city Called Rhodes. a leap he had made in a city Called Rhodes was so great, A certain man who visited foreign lands said, that no other man could leap anywhere near the distance. A great many persons in Rhodes had seen A certain man who visited foreign lands do it and would prove that what A certain man who visited foreign lands told was true. No need of witnesses, said one of the hearers. Suppose a city Called Rhodes is Rhodes. Now show us how far you can jump.
